name: RetroGunX
summary: Miss playing those 8-bit, button-bashing, classic arcade-style cabinet and cartridge games from the 70s and 80s? Ever wanted to experience the intense action from the point of view of the hero within the game? Now you can, in VIRTUAL REALITY.Take down wave after wave of unique enemies, each with their own style of movement and attack, and reminiscent of the art style (graphics capability) of the day. Collect power-ups, unlock new weapons and defeat massive bosses in this classic VR Shooter.
